## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.

```{r}
matrix(1:9, byrow=TRUE, nrow=3)


imperio_contrataca <- c(20, 30)
amenaza_fantasma <- c(35, 50)
nueva_esperanza <- c(60, 50)

starwars <- c(imperio_contrataca, amenaza_fantasma, nueva_esperanza)
starwars

region <- c("EU", "NO EU")
titulo <- c("El imperio contraataca", "Amenaza Fantasma", "Nueva Esperanza")

matriz_starwars <- matrix(starwars, byrow=TRUE, nrow=3, 
                          dimnames = list(c("A New Hope", "The Empire Strikes Back", "Return of the Jedi"), 
                                           c("US", "non-US")))
rownames(matriz_starwars) <- titulo
colnames(matriz_starwars) <- region
matriz_starwars

worldwide_vector <- rowSums(matriz_starwars)
worldwide_vector

nueva_matriz <- cbind(matriz_starwars, worldwide_vector)
nueva_matriz

box_office2 <- c(60, 70)

starwars_2 <- matrix(box_office2, nrow = 1, byrow = TRUE,
                     dimnames= list(c("El ataque de los clones"), c("EU", "NO EU")))

                     
all_matriz <- rbind(matriz_starwars, starwars_2)
all_matriz

totalTotal <- colSums(all_matriz)
totalTotal

noUS_ALL <- all_matriz[,1]
noUS_ALL
```
